title: Coming into Wilmington on I40, there is a sign that shows Wilmington 7 miles.  If you follow I40 to its end and then down College Rd you would end up on the other side of Shipyard Blvd in 7 miles.  Why is is so far off?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9435
